name: Stargazer (itch) (Astral Circus)
description:
PAGE UNDER CONSTRUCTION

Story:

One day two constellations' whereabouts became unknown. As the starry sky lost some of its essence,
scientists worked desperately in order to find the truth about the new emptyness of the sky.
That day would be later called the Darkest Night.
Should the Darkest Night last forever? The destiny of these stars is now in your hands.
In "Stargazer" you play as Milena a part-timer at Crepes' Café that witnessed the constellation's fall.

Characters:

Apodis: A shy boy that wants to be free. He doesn't stand out much but sometimes can be a little possessive.

Chamaeleon: A nice and playful liar. No one knows his true self.
